ignore.comment: Ignoring as the use of --extra-index-url is secure in pip install in workflows/install_package.yaml.
This can be avoided by validating user input passed to pandas.DataFrame.query.
CWE-502: Deserialization of Untrusted Data. Disputed by supplier. Not a vulnerability in Python 3.13.

CWE-379: Creation of Temporary File in Directory with Incorrect Permissions: pytest through 9.0.2 on UNIX relies on directories with the /tmp/pytest-of-{user} name pattern, which allows local users to cause a denial of service or possibly gain privileges.
